##### FILE: app_deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to wordpress/Deployment/wordpress:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: wordpress
  name: wordpress
  namespace: wordpress
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: wordpress
      tier: frontend
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: wordpress
        tier: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_HOST
          value: wordpress-mysql
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_USER
          value: wordpress
        image: wordpress:6.5.0-apache
        name: wordpress
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: wordpress
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/html
          name: wordpress-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: wordpress-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: wp-pv-claim

---

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/proj-app:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: proj-app
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---

Generation completed successfully.

apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: proj-app

    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

##### FILE: app_with_nginx_d.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/workout-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: workout-app
    tier: frontend
  name: workout-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: workout-app
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: workout-app
      name: workout-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: johndrake31/workout-app:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: workout-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: react-app
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: react-app

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/apparmorprofile1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/initcontainer1: unconfined
  name: apparmorprofile1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause

    securityContext:

        - ALL

        - ALL

  name: apparmorprofile1
  namespace: default

  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1

##### FILE: apparmorprofile1784.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/apparmorprofile1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/initcontainer1: unconfined
  name: apparmorprofile1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/apparmorprofile1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/initcontainer1: unconfined
  name: apparmorprofile1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1

---

policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Pod/apparmorprofile1 failed:
1 - validate-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed. rule validate-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/apparmorprofile1 failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/apparmorprofile1 failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/apparmorprofile1 failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Pod/apparmorprofile1 failed:
1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Pod/apparmorprofile1 failed:
1 - validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule validate-resources failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Pod/apparmorprofile1 failed:
1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Pod/apparmorprofile1 failed:
1 - validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/containers/0/securityContext/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource default/Pod/apparmorprofile1 failed:
1 - validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule validate-registries failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/image/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/apparmorprofile1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/initcontainer1: unconfined
  name: apparmorprofile1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/apparmorprofile1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/initcontainer1: unconfined
  name: apparmorprofile1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/apparmorprofile1

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/apparmorprofile1
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Pod/apparmorprofile1 failed:
1 - validate-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed. rule validate-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/apparmorprofile1 failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/apparmorprofile1 failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/apparmorprofile1 failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Pod/apparmorprofile1 failed:
1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Pod/apparmorprofile1 failed:
1 - validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule validate-resources failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Pod/apparmorprofile1 failed:
1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Pod/apparmorprofile1 failed:
1 - validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/containers/0/securityContext/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource default/Pod/apparmorprofile1 failed:
1 - validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule validate-registries failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/image/

##### FILE: apparmorprofile1840.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/apparmorprofile1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/initcontainer1: unconfined
  name: apparmorprofile1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/initcontainer1: unconfined

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:

    container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/initcontainer1: unconfined

    name: initcontainer1
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/apparmorprofile1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/initcontainer1: unconfined
  name: apparmorprofile1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause

    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/apparmorprofile1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/initcontainer1: unconfined
  name: apparmorprofile1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

##### FILE: appdeploy_editor_role.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRole/appdeploy-editor-role:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: rbac
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: app-deploy-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: appdeploy-editor-role
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: clusterrole
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: app-deploy-operator
  name: appdeploy-editor-role
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - akoserwal.akoserwal
  resources:
  - appdeploys
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - akoserwal.akoserwal
  resources:
  - appdeploys/status
  verbs:
  - get

---

##### FILE: appdeployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/vproapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: vproapp
  name: vproapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: vproapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vproapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: harmson/containerapp
        name: vproapp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: app-port
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - sleep 120
        image: busybox:latest
        name: init-db

---

##### FILE: appdomain2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/appdomain-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: letsencrypt-dns
    external-dns.alpha.kubernetes.io/hostname: '*.app.konst.fish'
    external-dns.alpha.kubernetes.io/target: tetra.shoal.konst.fish
  name: appdomain-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: '*.app.konst.fish'
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: ingress-nginx-defaultbackend
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - '*.app.konst.fish'
    secretName: appdomain-tls

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 1, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: appdomain-redirect.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/appdomain-redirect-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: letsencrypt-dns
    external-dns.alpha.kubernetes.io/hostname: app.konst.fish
    external-dns.alpha.kubernetes.io/target: tetra.shoal.konst.fish
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/permanent-redirect: https://shoal.konst.fish
  name: appdomain-redirect-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: app.konst.fish
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: ingress-nginx-defaultbackend
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - app.konst.fish
    secretName: appdomain-star-tls

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 1, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: appingress.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/appingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /$1
  name: appingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: webapp.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: bluesvc
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /blue
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: greensvc
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /green
        pathType: Prefix

---

metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /$1
  name: appingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: webapp.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: bluesvc
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /blue
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: greensvc
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /green
        pathType: Prefix

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 1, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/apple:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: apple
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/apple:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: apple
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/apple:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: apple
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/apple:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: apple
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

---

Generation completed successfully.

##### FILE: application_e2e.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-app-v1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: my-app-v1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-app-v1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-app-v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - uvicorn
        - main:app
        - --host
        - 0.0.0.0
        - --port
        - "8000"
        env:
        - name: ROOT_PATH
          value: /v1
        image: tiketdatahansen/echoserver:1.0
        name: echoserver
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000

---

##### FILE: application_e2e_4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/my-app-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
  name: my-app-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: my-app-svc.mydomain.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: my-app-v1-svc
            port:
              number: 5000
        path: /v1
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: my-app-v2-svc
            port:
              number: 5000
        path: /v2
        pathType: Prefix

---

  name: application-viewer-role
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - apps.lixiyu.cn
  resources:
  - applications
  verbs:
  - get
  - list
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - apps.lixiyu.cn
  resources:
  - applications/status
  verbs:
  - get

---

##### FILE: application137.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hello-dotnet:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: aspnetapp
  name: hello-dotnet
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: aspnetapp
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: aspnetapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/samples:aspnetapp
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
        name: aspnetapp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 60Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /diag
          name: diagvol
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: diagvol

---

  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: istio-system
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

##### FILE: application434_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/test-service-1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: test-service-1
    service: test-service-1
    version: v1
  name: test-service-1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: test-service-1
      service: test-service-1
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: test-service-1
        service: test-service-1
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CI
          value: "true"
        - name: LOCAL_POD_SERVICE_ACCOUNT
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.serviceAccountName
        - name: LOCAL_POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: LOCAL_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: LOCAL_POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: LOCAL_POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: LOCAL_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: VERSION
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.labels['version']
        image: service:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 30
        name: test-service-1
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
      serviceAccountName: test-service-1

---

##### FILE: application435_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/user-service:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: user-service
    service: user-service
    version: v1
  name: user-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: user-service
      service: user-service
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: user-service
        service: user-service
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CI
          value: "true"
        - name: LOCAL_POD_SERVICE_ACCOUNT
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.serviceAccountName
        - name: LOCAL_POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: LOCAL_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: LOCAL_POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: LOCAL_POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: LOCAL_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: VERSION
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.labels['version']
        - name: PGHOST
          value: postgres.database.svc.cluster.local
        - name: PGPORT
          value: "5432"
        - name: PGTZ
          value: UTC
        - name: PGAPPNAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.labels['app']
        - name: PGCONNECT_TIMEOUT
          value: "10"
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: user-service-postgres-secret
        image: service:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 30
        name: user-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/secrets/jwt-ecdsa-pem
          name: jwt-ecdsa-pem
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/secrets/jwt-signing-token
          name: jwt-signing-token
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: user-service
      volumes:
      - name: jwt-ecdsa-pem
        secret:
          optional: false
          secretName: jwt-ecdsa-pem
      - name: jwt-signing-token
        secret:
          optional: false
          secretName: jwt-signing-token

---

##### FILE: application461.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/busybox:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    component: busybox
  name: busybox
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      component: busybox
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        component: busybox
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - sh
        - -c
        - |
          while true; do
            echo $(date) - filebeat log >> /var/log/access.log;
            sleep 10;
          done
        image: busybox
        name: busybox
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: log
      - args:
        - -c
        - /etc/filebeat/conf.yaml
        - -e
        image: elastic/filebeat:7.16.3
        name: filebeat
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/filebeat
          name: filebeat-config
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: log
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: log
      - configMap:
          name: filebeat-config
        name: filebeat-config

---

kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:

    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: teama

  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: teama
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/teama:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: teama
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/teama:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: teama
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/teama:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: teama
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

---

  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - echo The app is running! && sleep 3600
    image: busybox:1.28
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    name: purple-container
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 100Mi
    terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
    terminationMessagePolicy: File
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount
      name: kube-api-access-s2zc6
      readOnly: true
  dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
  enableServiceLinks: true
  initContainers:
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - sleep 600
    image: busybox:1.28
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    name: warm-up-1
    resources: {}
    terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
    terminationMessagePolicy: File
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount
      name: kube-api-access-s2zc6
      readOnly: true
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - sleep 1200
    image: busybox:1.28
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    name: warm-up-2
    resources: {}
    terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
    terminationMessagePolicy: File
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount
      name: kube-api-access-s2zc6
      readOnly: true
  nodeName: controlplane
  preemptionPolicy: PreemptLowerPriority
  priority: 0
  restartPolicy: Always
  schedulerName: default-scheduler
  securityContext: {}
  serviceAccount: default
  serviceAccountName: default
  terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
  tolerations:
  - effect: NoExecute
    key: node.kubernetes.io/not-ready
    operator: Exists
    tolerationSeconds: 300
  - effect: NoExecute
    key: node.kubernetes.io/unreachable
    operator: Exists
    tolerationSeconds: 300
  volumes:
  - name: kube-api-access-s2zc6
    projected:
      defaultMode: 420
      sources:
      - serviceAccountToken:
          expirationSeconds: 3607
          path: token
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: ca.crt
            path: ca.crt
          name: kube-root-ca.crt
      - downwardAPI:
          items:
          - fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
            path: namespace

    matchLabels:
      app: appprotect-dos-arb
  template:

      labels:
        app: appprotect-dos-arb

      containers:

        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        resources:
          limits:

            memory: 128Mi

##### FILE: appprotect-ingress.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/appprotect-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    appprotect.f5.com/app-protect-enable: "True"
    appprotect.f5.com/app-protect-policy: test-namespace/example-policy
    appprotect.f5.com/app-protect-security-log: test-namespace/logconf
    appprotect.f5.com/app-protect-security-log-destination: syslog:server=<IP>:<PORT>
    appprotect.f5.com/app-protect-security-log-enable: "True"
  name: appprotect-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: appprotect.example.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: backend1-svc
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /backend1/v1
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: backend2-svc
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /backend2/v2
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - appprotect.example.com
    secretName: appprotect-secret

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/appprotect-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    appprotect.f5.com/app-protect-enable: "True"
    appprotect.f5.com/app-protect-policy: test-namespace/example-policy
    appprotect.f5.com/app-protect-security-log: test-namespace/logconf
    appprotect.f5.com/app-protect-security-log-destination: syslog:server=<IP>:<PORT>
    appprotect.f5.com/app-protect-security-log-enable: "True"
  name: appprotect-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: appprotect.example.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: backend1-svc
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /backend1
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: backend2-svc
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /backend2
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - appprotect.example.com
    secretName: appprotect-secret

  deletionGracePeriodSeconds: 10
  deletionTimestamp: "2009-01-01T01:01:01Z"
  finalizers:
  - finalizersValue
  generateName: generateNameValue
  generation: 7
  labels:
    labelsKey: labelsValue
  managedFields:
  - apiVersion: apiVersionValue
    fieldsType: fieldsTypeValue
    fieldsV1: {}
    manager: managerValue
    operation: operationValue
    subresource: subresourceValue
    time: "2004-01-01T01:01:01Z"
  name: nameValue
  namespace: namespaceValue
  ownerReferences:
  - apiVersion: apiVersionValue
    blockOwnerDeletion: true
    controller: true
    kind: kindValue
    name: nameValue
    uid: uidValue
  resourceVersion: resourceVersionValue

##### FILE: apps_v1_deployment_kubesync-controller-manager.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kubesync-system/Deployment/kubesync-controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: kubesync
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kubesync
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: kubesync-controller-manager
  namespace: kubesync-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: kubesync-controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource kubesync-system/Deployment/kubesync-controller-manager

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource kubesync-system/Deployment/kubesync-controller-manager
policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource kubesync-system/Deployment/kubesync-controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource kubesync-system/Deployment/kubesync-controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource kubesync-system/Deployment/kubesync-controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource kubesync-system/Deployment/kubesync-controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource kubesync-system/Deployment/kubesync-controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

##### FILE: apps_v1_deployment_kubesync-controller-manager1.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kubesync-system/Deployment/kubesync-controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: kubesync
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kubesync
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: kubesync-controller-manager
  namespace: kubesync-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: kubesync-controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

##### FILE: apps_v1_deployment_neoncode.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/neoncode:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    app.quarkus.io/vcs-uri: ssh://fluxpres@localhost:30022/home/fluxpres/git/neoncode.git
    prometheus.io/path: /q/metrics
    prometheus.io/port: "8080"
    prometheus.io/scheme: http
    prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: quarkus
    app.kubernetes.io/name: neoncode
  name: neoncode
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: neoncode
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        app.quarkus.io/vcs-uri: ssh://fluxpres@localhost:30022/home/fluxpres/git/neoncode.git
        prometheus.io/path: /q/metrics
        prometheus.io/port: "8080"
        prometheus.io/scheme: http
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: quarkus
        app.kubernetes.io/name: neoncode
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: KUBERNETES_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: localhost:5001/scienta/neon:1.0.0-SNAPSHOT
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /q/health/live
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: neoncode
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /q/health/ready
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /q/health/started
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 10

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/neoncode

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/neoncode
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/neoncode failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: sshd
  namespace: default

    matchLabels:
      app: sshd

    type: Recreate

    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sshd

      containers:
      - image: localhost:5001/flux_sshd:v1
        name: sshd

      volumes:

        app: server
        version: v2
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SERVER_MESSAGE
          value: Hi! I am version 2!
        image: server:v1.10
        name: server

##### FILE: appsrv.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/appsrv:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: appsrv
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: appsrv
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: appsrv
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: ghcr.io/balintb4/backend:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /q/health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 120
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: appsrv
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: 8080
        startupProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /q/health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          timeoutSeconds: 5

---

##### FILE: appstack_editor_role.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRole/appstack-editor-role:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: rbac
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: kube-builder
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: appstack-editor-role
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: clusterrole
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-builder
  name: appstack-editor-role
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - stack.kachi-bits
  resources:
  - appstacks
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - stack.kachi-bits
  resources:
  - appstacks/status
  verbs:
  - get

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/expose-test-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: expose-test-deployment
  name: expose-test-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/deployment-pidev-frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: label-deployment-pidev-frontend
  name: deployment-pidev-frontend
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: label-deployment-pidev-frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: label-deployment-pidev-frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mdjdocker/arctic4_pidev_frontend:latest
        name: pidev-frontend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: cport-80
      restartPolicy: Always

##### FILE: arctic4pidev_back_db_dep_ser.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/deployment-pidev-backend-database:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: label-deployment-pidev-backend-database
  name: deployment-pidev-backend-database
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: label-deployment-pidev-backend-database
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: label-deployment-pidev-backend-database
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: root
        image: mysql:latest
        name: pidev-database
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
      - image: mdjdocker/arctic4_pidev_backend:latest
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 20
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3306
        name: pidev-backend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: cport-9000
        - containerPort: 2424
          name: cport-2424
      restartPolicy: Always

---


Mutation:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/pod-pidev-backend-database:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    app: label-pod-pidev-backend-database
  name: pod-pidev-backend-database
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
      value: root

    name: pidev-database
    ports:
    - containerPort: 3306
      name: cport-3306
  - image: mdjdocker/arctic4_pidev_backend:latest
    livenessProbe:
      failureThreshold: 3
      initialDelaySeconds: 5
      periodSeconds: 20
      tcpSocket:
        port: 3306
    name: pidev-backend
    ports:
    - containerPort: 9000
      name: cport-9000
    - containerPort: 2424
      name: cport-2424
  restartPolicy: Always

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/deployment-pidev-backend-database:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: label-deployment-pidev-backend-database
  name: deployment-pidev-backend-database
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: label-deployment-pidev-backend-database
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: label-deployment-pidev-backend-database
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: root
        image: mysql:latest
        name: pidev-database
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: cport-3306
      - image: mdjdocker/arctic4_pidev_backend:latest
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 20
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3306
        name: pidev-backend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: cport-9000
        - containerPort: 2424
          name: cport-2424
      restartPolicy: Always

---

          name: volume-pidev-database

##### FILE: argo-cd.v2.10.6_15.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/argocd-redis-health-configmap:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  redis_liveness.sh: |
    response=$(
      redis-cli \
        -h localhost \
        -p 6379 \
        ping
    )
    if [ "$response" != "PONG" ] && [ "${response:0:7}" != "LOADING" ] ; then
      echo "$response"
      exit 1
    fi
    echo "response=$response"
  redis_readiness.sh: |
    response=$(
      redis-cli \
        -h localhost \
        -p 6379 \
        ping
    )
    if [ "$response" != "PONG" ] ; then
      echo "$response"
      exit 1
    fi
    echo "response=$response"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: redis
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-redis
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: argocd
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v2.10.6
    helm.sh/chart: argo-cd-6.7.10
  name: argocd-redis-health-configmap
  namespace: default

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: argo-cd.v2.10.6_43.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/argocd-notifications-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: notifications-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-notifications-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: argocd
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v2.10.6
    helm.sh/chart: argo-cd-6.7.10
  name: argocd-notifications-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
      app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-notifications-controller
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: notifications-controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-notifications-controller
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: argocd
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v2.10.6
        helm.sh/chart: argo-cd-6.7.10
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchLabels:
                  app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-notifications-controller
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - args:
        - /usr/local/bin/argocd-notifications
        - --metrics-port=9001
        - --loglevel=info
        - --logformat=text
        - --namespace=default
        - --argocd-repo-server=argocd-repo-server:8081
        - --secret-name=argocd-notifications-secret
        env:
        - name: ARGOCD_NOTIFICATIONS_CONTROLLER_LOGLEVEL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: notificationscontroller.log.level
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        - name: ARGOCD_NOTIFICATIONS_CONTROLLER_LOGFORMAT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: notificationscontroller.log.format
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        - name: ARGOCD_APPLICATION_NAMESPACES
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: application.namespaces
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        - name: ARGOCD_NOTIFICATION_CONTROLLER_SELF_SERVICE_NOTIFICATION_ENABLED
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: notificationscontroller.selfservice.enabled
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        image: quay.io/argoproj/argocd:v2.10.6
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: notifications-controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9001
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        resources: {}
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/config/tls
          name: tls-certs
        - mountPath: /app/config/reposerver/tls
          name: argocd-repo-server-tls
        workingDir: /app
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      serviceAccountName: argocd-notifications-controller
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: argocd-tls-certs-cm
        name: tls-certs
      - name: argocd-repo-server-tls
        secret:
          items:
          - key: tls.crt
            path: tls.crt
          - key: tls.key
            path: tls.key
          - key: ca.crt
            path: ca.crt
          optional: true
          secretName: argocd-repo-server-tls

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/argocd-dex-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: dex-server
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-dex-server
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: argocd
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v2.10.6
    helm.sh/chart: argo-cd-6.7.10
  name: argocd-dex-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
      app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-dex-server
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        checksum/cmd-params: 857d22e253aab0d0f3bea96c59a5b48fd3bea7cac9e98a37df18c9a2f5d77968
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: dex-server
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-dex-server
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: argocd
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v2.10.6
        helm.sh/chart: argo-cd-6.7.10
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchLabels:
                  app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-dex-server
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - args:
        - rundex
        command:
        - /shared/argocd-dex
        - --logformat=text
        - --loglevel=info
        env:
        - name: ARGOCD_DEX_SERVER_DISABLE_TLS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: dexserver.disable.tls
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/dexidp/dex:v2.38.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: dex-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5556
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 5557
          name: grpc
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 5558
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        resources: {}
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /shared
          name: static-files
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: dexconfig
        - mountPath: /tls
          name: argocd-dex-server-tls
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /bin/cp
        - -n
        - /usr/local/bin/argocd
        - /shared/argocd-dex
        image: quay.io/argoproj/argocd:v2.10.6
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: copyutil
        resources: {}
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /shared
          name: static-files
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: dexconfig
      serviceAccountName: argocd-dex-server
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: static-files
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: dexconfig
      - name: argocd-dex-server-tls
        secret:
          items:
          - key: tls.crt
            path: tls.crt
          - key: tls.key
            path: tls.key
          - key: ca.crt
            path: ca.crt
          optional: true
          secretName: argocd-dex-server-tls

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/argocd-redis:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: redis
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-redis
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: argocd
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v2.10.6
    helm.sh/chart: argo-cd-6.7.10
  name: argocd-redis
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-redis
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: redis
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-redis
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: argocd
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v2.10.6
        helm.sh/chart: argo-cd-6.7.10
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchLabels:
                  app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-redis
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - args:
        - --save
        - ""
        - --appendonly
        - "no"
        image: public.ecr.aws/docker/library/redis:7.2.4-alpine
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: redis
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
          name: redis
          protocol: TCP
        resources: {}
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /health
          name: health
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 999
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: default
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 493
          name: argocd-redis-health-configmap
        name: health

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/argocd-cm:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  admin.enabled: "true"
  application.instanceLabelKey: argocd.argoproj.io/instance
  exec.enabled: "false"
  server.rbac.log.enforce.enable: "false"
  timeout.hard.reconciliation: 0s
  timeout.reconciliation: 180s
  url: https://argocd.example.com

  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: server
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name

  name: argocd-server
  namespace: default

  apiGroup: rbac.authorization.k8s.io
  kind: ClusterRole
  name: argocd-server
subjects:

  name: argocd-server
  namespace: argocd

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/argocd-dex-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: dex-server
    app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-dex-server
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: argocd
  name: argocd-dex-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-dex-server
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-dex-server
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchLabels:
                  app.kubernetes.io/part-of: argocd
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 5
      containers:
      - command:
        - /shared/argocd-dex
        - rundex
        env:
        - name: ARGOCD_DEX_SERVER_DISABLE_TLS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: dexserver.disable.tls
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/dexidp/dex:v2.37.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: dex
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5556
        - containerPort: 5557
        - containerPort: 5558
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /shared
          name: static-files
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: dexconfig
        - mountPath: /tls
          name: argocd-dex-server-tls
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /bin/cp
        - -n
        - /usr/local/bin/argocd
        - /shared/argocd-dex
        image: quay.io/argoproj/argocd:v2.10.2
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: copyutil
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /shared
          name: static-files
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: dexconfig
      serviceAccountName: argocd-dex-server
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: static-files
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: dexconfig
      - name: argocd-dex-server-tls
        secret:
          items:
          - key: tls.crt
            path: tls.crt
          - key: tls.key
            path: tls.key
          - key: ca.crt
            path: ca.crt
          optional: true
          secretName: argocd-dex-server-tls

##### FILE: argo-cm-nodeport_45.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/argocd-notifications-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: notifications-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-notifications-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: argocd
  name: argocd-notifications-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-notifications-controller
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-notifications-controller
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /usr/local/bin/argocd-notifications
        env:
        - name: ARGOCD_NOTIFICATIONS_CONTROLLER_LOGFORMAT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: notificationscontroller.log.format
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        - name: ARGOCD_NOTIFICATIONS_CONTROLLER_LOGLEVEL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: notificationscontroller.log.level
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        - name: ARGOCD_APPLICATION_NAMESPACES
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: application.namespaces
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        - name: ARGOCD_NOTIFICATION_CONTROLLER_SELF_SERVICE_NOTIFICATION_ENABLED
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: notificationscontroller.selfservice.enabled
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        image: quay.io/argoproj/argocd:v2.10.2
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9001
        name: argocd-notifications-controller
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/config/tls
          name: tls-certs
        - mountPath: /app/config/reposerver/tls
          name: argocd-repo-server-tls
        workingDir: /app
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: argocd-notifications-controller
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: argocd-tls-certs-cm
        name: tls-certs
      - name: argocd-repo-server-tls
        secret:
          items:
          - key: tls.crt
            path: tls.crt
          - key: tls.key
            path: tls.key
          - key: ca.crt
            path: ca.crt
          optional: true
          secretName: argocd-repo-server-tls

---

              labelSelector:
                matchLabels:
                  app.kubernetes.io/part-of: argocd
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 5
      containers:
      - args:
        - --save
        - ""
        - --appendonly
        - "no"
        image: redis:7.0.14-alpine
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: redis
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 999
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: argocd-redis

kind: Deployment

  namespace: argo-events

  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - controller
        env:
        - name: ARGO_EVENTS_IMAGE
          value: quay.io/argoproj/argo-events:v1.9.0
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: quay.io/argoproj/argo-events:v1.9.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 3
        name: controller-manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 3
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/argo-events
          name: controller-config-volume
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 9731
      serviceAccountName: argo-events-sa
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: argo-events-controller-config
        name: controller-config-volume

        settings: |
          # https://docs.nats.io/running-a-nats-service/configuration#jetstream
          # Only configure "max_memory_store" or "max_file_store", do not set "store_dir" as it has been hardcoded.
          # e.g. 1G. -1 means no limit, up to 75%!o(MISSING)f available memory
          max_memory_store: -1
          # e.g. 20G. -1 means no limit, Up to 1TB if available
          max_file_store: 1TB

          # The default properties of the streams to be created in this JetStream service
          maxMsgs: 50000
          maxAge: 168h
          maxBytes: -1
          replicas: 3
          duplicates: 300s

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/argocd-server-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: letsencrypt-prod
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/backend-protocol: HTTPS
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-passthrough: "true"
  name: argocd-server-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: argo.devtechops.dev
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: argocd-server
            port:
              name: https
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - argo.devtechops.dev
    secretName: tls-secret

---

##### FILE: argo-ingress1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to argocd/Ingress/argocd-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-passthrough: "true"
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: letsencrypt-production
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/backend-protocol: HTTP
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/force-ssl-redirect: "false"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /$1
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/use-regex: "true"
  name: argocd-ingress
  namespace: argocd
spec:
  rules:
  - host: argo.devtechops.dev
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: argocd-server
            port:
              name: http
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  - host: frontend.devtechops.dev
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: kuberada-python-svc
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

---

    archiveLogs: true
    s3:
      bucket: my-bucket
      endpoint: minio:9000
      insecure: true
      accessKeySecret:
        name: my-minio-cred
        key: accesskey
      secretKeySecret:
        name: my-minio-cred
        key: secretkey
  empty: ""
  my-key: |
    archiveLogs: true
    s3:
      bucket: my-bucket
      endpoint: minio:9000
      insecure: true
      accessKeySecret:
        name: my-minio-cred
        key: accesskey
      secretKeySecret:
        name: my-minio-cred
        key: secretkey
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  annotations:
    workflows.argoproj.io/default-artifact-repository: default-v1
  name: artifact-repositories
  namespace: default

##### FILE: argo-quick-start-minimal_32.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/workflow-controller-configmap:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  artifactRepository: |
    s3:
      bucket: my-bucket
      endpoint: minio:9000
      insecure: true
      accessKeySecret:
        name: my-minio-cred
        key: accesskey
      secretKeySecret:
        name: my-minio-cred
        key: secretkey
  columns: |
    - name: Workflow Completed
      type: label
      key: workflows.argoproj.io/completed
  executor: |
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 10m
        memory: 64Mi
  images: |
    docker/whalesay:v3.5.4:
       cmd: [cowsay]
  links: |
    - name: Workflow Link
      scope: workflow
      url: http://logging-facility?namespace=${metadata.namespace}&workflowName=${metadata.name}&startedAt=${status.startedAt}&finishedAt=${status.finishedAt}
    - name: Pod Link
      scope: pod
      url: http://logging-facility?namespace=${metadata.namespace}&podName=${metadata.name}&startedAt=${status.startedAt}&finishedAt=${status.finishedAt}
    - name: Pod Logs Link
      scope: pod-logs
      url: http://logging-facility?namespace=${metadata.namespace}&podName=${metadata.name}&startedAt=${status.startedAt}&finishedAt=${status.finishedAt}
    - name: Event Source Logs Link
      scope: event-source-logs
      url: http://logging-facility?namespace=${metadata.namespace}&podName=${metadata.name}&startedAt=${status.startedAt}&finishedAt=${status.finishedAt}
    - name: Sensor Logs Link
      scope: sensor-logs
      url: http://logging-facility?namespace=${metadata.namespace}&podName=${metadata.name}&startedAt=${status.startedAt}&finishedAt=${status.finishedAt}
    - name: Completed Workflows
      scope: workflow-list
      url: http://workflows?label=workflows.argoproj.io/completed=true
  metricsConfig: |
    enabled: true
    path: /metrics
    port: 9090
  namespaceParallelism: "10"
  retentionPolicy: |
    completed: 10
    failed: 3
    errored: 3
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: workflow-controller-configmap
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

kind: Deployment
metadata:

  namespace: default

    matchLabels:
      app: argo-server
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: argo-server
    spec:
      containers:

        - server
        - --namespaced
        - --auth-mode
        - server
        - --auth-mode
        - client
        env: []

        ports:
        - containerPort: 2746
          name: web
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 2746
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 20
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: argo-server
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp

          periodSeconds: 60
          timeoutSeconds: 30

          name: metrics

          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      priorityClassName: workflow-controller
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
